data.quote: Can't do is like don't care.
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quote: Do the best you can until you know better. Then when you know better, do better.
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quote: Develop enough courage so that you can stand up for yourself and then stand up for somebody else.
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quote: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quote: Life is pure adventure, and the sooner we realize that, the quicker we will be able to treat life as art.
data.author: Maya Angelou
